subject: deviced: Apply kernel coding convention rules
commitMessage:
deviced: Apply kernel coding convention rules

Do not initialise statics to 0 or NULL
Do not use C99 // comments
Space required before the open parenthesis '('
Change (foo*) to (foo *)
Space required around that '=' (ctx:VxV)
Switch and case should be at the same indent

Change-Id: I8a822a01ae5cb21354ff4aea5c82f2a439d95e35
Signed-off-by: Jiyoung Yun <jy910.yun@samsung.com>
